website_summaries.verdict: A basic paraffin bath for those exploring whether this treatment can help them at home.
pros: Can be used on hands, feet, wrists, ankles and elbows
Oversized tank fits up to a man's size 12.5 foot
Operating temperature of 125-134º F. Lightweight and portable
cons: No on/off switch, so consider using with a power strip or a timer plug

customer_reviews.title: "They were right,"
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of this machine. I do agree with others about the lid issue. I quickly remedied this by using a gripper. I plugged the machine in, added the wax and it began to melt. When I checked it later the light was out so I opened it and found the wax just as solid as it came. The unit never cycled back on. I am disappointed, but I'm sending it back with the wax still in it and buying another one. If the next one fails I will be looking at another brand. From the reviews it appears that there are some bad units out there.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Major lid problems=heartache & frustration
customer_reviews.text: It melts the wax fine and is a big enough basin for feet- I said something nice. On the whole, the biggest and most annoying problem is the design of the lid. It is hard to grip the 'handle' aka the slight raised center channel of plastic. The lid itself rests on the shallowest of lips inside the basin. What this means is at least every other time you will not seat it properly and it will dunk in the wax itself. My lid was very moisturized. I wish I could return this.
customer_reviews.author: dilemma

customer_reviews.title: This has really helped.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been having issues with the joints in her hands, namely her fingers. We bought this in the hopes that it may relieve some of the pain. Now I am not going to tout this as a cure-all but it has help her out immensely. She has used this off an on for some time now and she has a lot more freedom of movement and a lot less pain.
customer_reviews.author: Vince_A

customer_reviews.title: This is a great kit at a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and are very pleased with our WaxWel 11-1600 Paraffin Bath Kit. After reading the instructions it was "plug and dip". By breaking the 1-pound blocks of wax into smaller pieces, the 6 pounds of wax were completely melted in approximately 2 hours. We keep our unit plugged in and the wax stays at a constant temperature while the outside of the unit remains cool to the touch. The unit is deep, wide and long enough to allay any concerns about displacement. I fully immersed my size11 foot and there was plenty of room to spare. With the included plastic and terry cloth mitts and booties we had baby-soft feet and hands before night's end.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Junk! Don’t purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We had this item less than a month, and already encountering problems. It’s heating the wax to almost 180 degrees. We call the manufacture and was told to add more wax. The wax is almost to the top, and still about 180 degrees. Not worth the money!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: The unit is light weight but sturdy. I may need to buy wax on a ...
customer_reviews.text: As a sufferer of osteoarthritis, I have had Paraffin Wax Therapy at the Rehab Center in town. Needless to say, I researched brands on line for the units that I can continually keep on for use just about every day. The unit is light weight but sturdy. I may need to buy wax on a more frequent basis since I use for both hands & feet. The relief feels great when I need it most at night.
customer_reviews.author: Pseg

customer_reviews.title: I liked that it came with everything you need including the ...
customer_reviews.text: Physical therapist prescribed hot wax treatment and this does the job. I liked that it came with everything you need including the wax, the mitts and mitt liners. Points off due to cord failure (prong broke off after 5 months of daily use). Contacted Amazon for cord replacement; they sent me to manufacturer who sent me (very rudely) back to Amazon. Amazon sent me a whole new system.
customer_reviews.author: WVSWFR

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months- Manufacture is flaky on RMA.
customer_reviews.text: Lid and design is poor, falls into well. What a mess. Product FAILED after four months of LIGHT use. FEI out of NY would NOT replace the unit, thank god Amazon stepped up. AVOID this product and FEI.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Hallett

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my paraffin bath unit. It's large enough that my husband's size 10 foot fits in it. The temperature is perfect - not too hot as in some I have used. My hands and feet feel so soft when done.
customer_reviews.author: Anita R. Tatro

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This paraffin wax bath is amazing! It only took an hour to melt all the wax. Very well made. It comes with just enough wax to fill the tub to its capacity. It also comes with enough bags to last quite a while. Great size for hands and feet! Very happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B

customer_reviews.title: Missing wax.
customer_reviews.text: The unit looks nice and easy to use but, unfortunately the listed wax did not come with the package as advertised. Not sure how you forget 6lbs of wax but, not worth returning just to buy another one, going to buy additional wax instead.
customer_reviews.author: Brian O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular machine because you can leave it plugged in so it remains hot all the time. I had surgery on my right foot and left hand and the hot paraffin wax is great for therapy and recovery.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: I gave to my spouse. Here's what he had ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave to my spouse. Here's what he had to say: Would be a five star except it takes so long to heat up. Nothing else wrong. Use on my arthritic feet weekly and it has helped with pain management. I have huge feet, size 13 extra wide.
customer_reviews.author: rwinfrey73

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy! Just more cheap junk.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 9 months. It worked okay until I plugged it in and now it’s dead. The price I paid should have paid for a quality product, but I think this is another example of a low quality Chinese product. Buy American or European products and cut down on waste.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Second unit just fine. Great therapy for arthritic hands
customer_reviews.text: While the first unit we received was defective we had no trouble either returning it or receiving a replacement. Second unit just fine. Great therapy for arthritic hands!
customer_reviews.author: June Jordan

customer_reviews.title: I bought this unit in February 2017 of this year ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit in February 2017 of this year and the unit doesn't work at all anymore. I went to use it in June and discovered that it doesn't work anymore!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Frankel

customer_reviews.title: Wax blocks  not included
customer_reviews.text: Did not get what it says was included. On the title, the wax blocks are listed as included, but when I got the order, it says on the box holding the item, wax blocks NOT included. So now I have to order and can not use until I get them.
customer_reviews.author: yogelena

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: At first I was happy with this product but it stopped working after 6 months. I never left it plugged in and only used it about once a week. I was very upset when I plugged it in and nothing happened. I tried a different power cord and it didn't work. I contacted the seller and never received a reply. I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JaX M

customer_reviews.title: perfect perchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I have made for my RA hands! Its 100% quality!
customer_reviews.author: C. R.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this. Plenty big enough for mens feet and ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. Plenty big enough for mens feet and hands and holds a generous amount of wax. Only 4 stars because it comes with just 1 mitt and slipper each... you would think a pair would be reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Swangirl

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy with this
customer_reviews.text: only 1 temperature, but it is pretty nice; not too warm or too cold. Nice sized tub too. I am happy I got this. It is a great price.
customer_reviews.author: TME

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: So far the unit works, but there is no way to control the temperature. When the wax finally melted it was to hot for my hands I had to unplug it to cool down. Had I know there was no way to control temperature I would not have bought this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Green

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Use the paraffin wax bath three times and it stopped heating. I spent lot of money on this thinking if I purchase a more expensive product I wouldn’t have any trouble. Wrong. I am out 130.00 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Other than a stained mitt, I am very happy with this product. I guess the mitt was returned and not cleaned. Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Unit stopped heating the wax after approximately 3 months
customer_reviews.text: There were basically two problems with this product: 1. The LID. One use for the product is for users that have limited use of their hands and fingers. Then why is the lid of such poor design? It is not easy to grip and can easily fall partially into the hot wax. 2. It just flat out stopped working after about three months.
customer_reviews.author: Harold H. Kisler

customer_reviews.title: Im sure there are better for the $
customer_reviews.text: Takes 4+hrs to get wax to peak temp. No settings . Just plug in and unplug.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for arthritic right hand and wrist ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for arthritic right hand and wrist. Wish I could use it more often but time is a factor.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy P. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great for arthritic hands.
customer_reviews.text: The warm wax makes my arthritic hands feel great. An added benefit is my skin and cuticles are softer.
customer_reviews.author: Annette L. Bierkamp

customer_reviews.title: I loved this item until I went to change the wax
customer_reviews.text: I loved this item until I went to change the wax. I emptied the wax out, wiped the inside out and put new wax in and plugged the waxwell in and now it don't turn on!!!!! Purchased in October 2016 and worked for 3 months. How can I get this replaced?
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I love this wax bath! I have arthritis in both hands. I cannot believe how much it helps me! I use it 3-4 times day! 5STARS
customer_reviews.author: funguy

customer_reviews.title: I loved So Happy With It The Temperatura it's perfect no ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved So Happy With It The Temperatura it's perfect no to hot mantener the same temperature old the time Looking Good To
customer_reviews.author: iris Herr

customer_reviews.title: WaxWel 11-1600 paraffin bath kit
customer_reviews.text: i like it when it is warm, it does take a while for the wax to melt so prepare a 6 hour wait.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anne Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Ad was misleading
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit but the wax was not lavender as described, misleading ad
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L Murphy

customer_reviews.title: She has wanted one for a while and it was the perfect birthday present
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. She has wanted one for a while and it was the perfect birthday present. Its a great unit. It is well built. Hers plugged in and worked perfectly right out of the box. It melted two bricks of wax in a few hours while keeping the wax at a constant temperature. There is no temperature setting (one temp for all) but this is not necessary. I can put my size 12 foot in the bath with no problem. My wife loves it. All thumbs up for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Engstrom

customer_reviews.title: pain relief!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have Neuropathy in my hands and feet!! Sometimes the pain is unbearable! My hands and feet also get very cold and they turn purple!! I also have rhematoid arthritis and this paraffin unit is a blessing. Relieves pain as well.
customer_reviews.author: J Davis

customer_reviews.title: Be careful the wax is hot and to keep away from CHILDREN
customer_reviews.text: The paraffin wax is a great product and works great. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Although this bath contained wax, bags, hand and foot mitts, I am not really happy with the operation of the bath itself. No matter how long you have it plugged in it won't melt all the wax. I had 5 lbs of wax in the bath and had it plugged in for 16 hours and it still wouldn't melt all the wax. The best it has done is melt the middle of the wax enough to stick your hand in, and that is even now when it is down to about 4 lbs remaining. Also, the wax that is melted is too hot. I would not buy this model again.
customer_reviews.author: AnonNC

customer_reviews.title: I used it many times and it works perfect, both my hands and feet feel great after ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it many times and it works perfect,both my hands and feet feel great after using,nice and soft.. I will definitely buy from this company again ..Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: It is Wonderful !!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Melts wax well! Heats excellent! Well worth the cost!!
customer_reviews.author: Bettye Jean James

customer_reviews.title: This works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: This product works well. Helps with the pain that I experience daily from a work related injury I sustained a year and a half ago. Arrived in a timely manner. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Jokersapprentic

customer_reviews.title: Works great but need to include instrutions with a cleat pic of fill lines
customer_reviews.text: Needed clearer instructions . I do not see well and never sure wherer the fill lines are. Also how does one clean the well?
customer_reviews.author: Judith Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great product. My therapy is progressing well
customer_reviews.text: It met and beat my expectations. Great product. My therapy is progressing well.
customer_reviews.author: AR Sammamish

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly but was the wrong wax. It came with wintergreen wax instead of the lavender that I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this for warming up my hand for stretching and physical therapy at home due to recent surgery. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works like they said & is helpful with arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Covell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Only a day later than it was supposed to be
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works as described and expected. Holds constant and steady temperature.
customer_reviews.author: John McWhorter

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this paraffin bath! Takes a little time to heat up, but worth the wait. Big enough for feet too!
customer_reviews.author: Cooper's

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hoowa!! My sweeties hands and feet love you guys a definate 5🌟!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it's just me...
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions, but must have done something wrong. I used 6 lbs. of paraffin and it took HOURS to melt. I found the wax dipping process messy and strongly suggest using a plastic bag or something to catch the drips. Next time, I'm going to use only 4 lbs. of paraffin and hope to enjoy the process more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good paraffin bath
customer_reviews.text: It has been a good deal so far. It was fast to get and easy to use. I would recommend it to my friends
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for arthritis!
customer_reviews.text: We use this almost every day to soothe the pain of arthritis in hands and feet. Smoothe skin a real bonus!
customer_reviews.author: JVT

customer_reviews.title: Just be ready. These things are m e s ...
customer_reviews.text: Just be ready. These things are m e s s y. Also, I attached a knob handle because the lid is difficult to use otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: parafin wax bath
customer_reviews.text: loved the paraffin wax bath kit and was everything I wanted it for it works great for someone with arthritis it will loosen up your fingers and helps to ease the pain
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Confused
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why one hand mitt and one boot mitt. Should I have got 2 of each!?
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Waxwel Paraffin Bath
customer_reviews.text: It has worked well; but, wish I could leave it on all the time. Instructions say not to, only when you are around. I think that is true of most appliances. The wax that came with it was great. Helps heat up my hand so I can move it....broken elbow - works great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Fontaine

customer_reviews.title: ONLY WORKED ONCE, then pooooooffffff
customer_reviews.text: So sad. Worked ONCE, then never again. Now, can't replace it because it exceeded return date when we tried to turn it on and it didn't turn on. Looking for a way to feedback to Amazon to see if they can help us.
customer_reviews.author: hg

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit. Melts wax rather quickly
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. Melts wax rather quickly. Includes wax, bags, hand mitt, and foot mitt. Lid could fit tighter as it can slide into the wax if your hands are slick after using.
customer_reviews.author: tab

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I was REALLY impressed with the customer service I received. For the price, I feel I received a quality product!!
customer_reviews.author: LOLO

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: i was very disappointed in this. The wax was too hot to put your hands in and when I called to return it they told me it was too late even though it took awhile to heat the wax to even test it.. I gave it away . Poor service, poor product
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit, but gets too hot
customer_reviews.text: I received my paraffin bath yesterday and set it up. Less than five hours later, it was ready to go. I was pleased with how quickly the paraffin melted, but soon found out that it gets pretty hot - uncomfortably so, and there is no way to regulate the temperature. I think I'll try unplugging it about 10 minutes before I'm ready to use it and see if that helps. It's a good value, but just be careful to not burn yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Easilyannoyed

product_meta.title: Waxwel Paraffin Wax Bath Unit, 6 lb Capacity
product_meta.description:
Style:Unit Only| Size:Unit

The WaxWel Paraffin Wax Bath unit is excellent for promoting skin health and rehabilitating deep tissue injuries through the use of soothing paraffin heat therapy. This unit is ideal for heavy-duty use in high-traffic clinics or great to use at home as the unit is lightweight and portable. Use it in clinics, salons, spas, or bring the relaxing spa experience home. Offered with an oversized tank, the unit can accommodate a man's size 12.5 foot and holds 6 lbs of paraffin wax. Easily bathe hands, feet, wrists, ankles and elbows in the paraffin wax. It is great to use to soften and smooth skin, and ideal to use to soothe the pain of arthritis, joint stiffness, inflammation, sports injuries, and muscle spasms. Continued use of heat therapy is also an effective way to increase range of motion.

The WaxWel Bath Unit is offered with a lid, grill, guide and standard operating temperature of 125 to 134 degrees Fahrenheit. The tank features an insulated outer housing to help retain heat. It can accommodate any brand of paraffin moist heat treatment wax. This listing is for the unit only with no accessories included.



MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
18004312830
feature_bullets: Great for use in heat therapy to soften and smooth skin, and alleviate arthritis and joint pain
Perfect for heavy duty use in high traffic clinics or for use at home
Oversized tank fits up to a man's size 12.5 foot; Use on hands, feet, wrists, ankles and elbows
Unit is lightweight, portable and has a 6 lb capacity
Includes Waxwel Paraffin Bath Unit only, no accessories

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
